\documentclass{article}
\title{A Simple Article}
\author{John Doe}

\begin{document}

\section{Introduction}

This is a simple LaTeX article. It demonstrates basic features like \textbf{bold text} and \emph{italic text}.

\subsection{Math Examples}

Here's some inline math: $x^2 + y^2 = z^2$

\section{Lists}

\begin{itemize}
\item First item
\item Second item
\item Third item
\end{itemize}

\begin{enumerate}
\item Numbered one
\item Numbered two
\end{enumerate}

\section{Conclusion}

This concludes our simple article.

\end{document}
